subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re:Picking up someone named Steve on Ghost Box 23L
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Yeah, I know about the white noise, it's the AGC, it amplifies the noise too 
much, so I took it out of the new design, and bypassed it #12. For myself, I 
want clear voices as much as possible, not the stuff made out of noise.

Frank


>From: Rosemary Ellen Guiley <reguiley@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re:Picking up someone named Steve on Ghost Box 23L
>Date: Tue, 14 Aug 2007 09:23:02 -0400
>
>Thanks Frank for the tips on Box 23L and the buzzing.? Craig is excellent 
>on the tech end of things.? We got a lot of white noise sound on 22, but it 
>may be lack of signals in that area, as 22 seems to scan OK elsewhere.? The 
>group is recording every week, so maybe we can get some progressive 
>communication going.
>
>Rosemary
